about_the_game:
DLC CONTENTS


This gives you a mallet with $9999 as well as the possibility to play in three different modes.

DIRTY HARRY:
Classic Gun + Sheriff Stars + KGB Agenda + 30 of All "Simple Gun" Bullets

D. BILZERIAN
Love Pendant + Waifu Ring + Sexy Handcuffs + 8 NRG Pills (+3/day) + 3 Love Potion (+2/day)

BRITISH MUSEUM

$6666 mallet INSTEAD of $999 + 6 RARE Items + 6 RARE Armors
(Armors may vary)

Enhance your adventure with these great packages full of unique, super items!
